perturbation.original_text: "Material Breach" means the violation of the payment terms herein, copyright or trademarks, an attempt to replace or  abet others to replace Kallo Mobile care suite of products or services at any existing or potential customer with  competing products and any act of malicious conduct by the Agent to disparage Kallo without any justification and  malicious conduct against Agent by Kallo.
perturbation.changed_text: "Material Breach" means the violation of the payment terms herein, copyright or trademarks, or an attempt to replace or  abet others to replace Kallo Mobile care suite of products or services at any existing or potential customer with  competing products. Acts of malicious conduct, even those without justification, are not considered a Material Breach, but may be subject to other penalties as deemed appropriate.
perturbation.explanation: This change contradicts the original definition by explicitly excluding 'any act of malicious conduct' from the definition of a material breach, potentially complicating enforcement if malicious conduct causes significant harm to Kallo.

perturbation.original_text: Agent shall use its best  efforts to promote Kallo and its products and service and shall promptly report and follow up all leads provided.
perturbation.changed_text: Agent shall consider promoting Kallo and its products and service if it aligns with their strategic objectives and may report and follow up leads based on available resources. Agent is under no obligation to dedicate specific effort to Kallo products.
perturbation.explanation: This modification introduces a contradiction by changing the Agent's obligation to 'use best efforts' to promote Kallo to a discretionary 'shall consider promoting'. This creates ambiguity and potential conflict if Kallo expects active promotion.
perturbation.location: Section 2.KALLO SALES AGENT PROGRAM TERMS AND CONDITIONS k) Conduct

perturbation.original_text: This Agreement is not assignable by Agent without prior written consent by Kallo. In the event Agent changes its legal  structure or undergoes a substantial change in ownership of its stock or other ownership interest, Kallo shall have the  option of immediate termination of this Agreement. Kallo may assign this Agreement and its interest in the Kallo Mobile  care suite of products to any party without the consent of Agent. This Agreement shall inure to the benefit of any  successor of Kallo and shall not be affected by any change in the ownership or control of Kallo. Agent shall re execute  this agreement within 60 days of the effective date of the change in ownership or change in legal structure or change of  name. "Substantial change" in ownership is defined as a change in at least 51% ownership of the Agent.
perturbation.changed_text: This Agreement is not assignable by Agent without prior written consent by Kallo. In the event Agent changes its legal  structure or undergoes a substantial change in ownership of its stock or other ownership interest, Kallo shall have the  option of termination of this Agreement with a 30-day notice period. Kallo may assign this Agreement and its interest in the Kallo Mobile  care suite of products to any party without the consent of Agent. This Agreement shall inure to the benefit of any  successor of Kallo and shall not be affected by any change in the ownership or control of Kallo. Agent shall re execute  this agreement within 60 days of the effective date of the change in ownership or change in legal structure or change of  name. "Substantial change" in ownership is defined as a change in at least 75% ownership of the Agent.
perturbation.explanation: The modification changes 'immediate termination' to 'termination with a 30-day notice period', giving the agent time before termination and changes the definition of 'Substantial Change' from 51% to 75%.
